name: Italia 1990
overview: Up to four human players can do battle in this budget-priced football game, with competitive and team 2-player options. Eight teams compete to win the greatest tournament of all, with matches of between 5 and 90 minutes length, viewed from above and scrolling up and down. The kits are always red and yellow. Standard football mechanics are implemented, including throw-ins, penalties, fouls, corners and goal kicks. The game also includes a Circuit Training mode, in which you can try 100m sprints, dribbling practice, weight-lifting and press-ups.
